patthana14.27:1.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:1.1_1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:1.1_2: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:2.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:3.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.27:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
